### 🛠 I do
- 📱 **Android** & **iOS** Apps
- 👨‍💻 With a strong focus on Quality, Performance & UX
- 👨‍🏫 **Teach** App Development
- ✈️ **Travel** whenever I can
- 💚 And love **Trekking** in the mountains

- 🤖 Android [Kotlin, Java]
